item.description: Bring a project you are working on! Try taking things apart, soldering things together, and making them do something new. This meeting is aimed at people already doing projects, but the next meeting will be an introduction to Arduino. Soldering irons, oscilloscopes, and common tools will be available.  I have some printers that people can take apart and a laser range finder that I have been working on controlling from an Arduino.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at Sprout, probably upstairs near a small pile of printers.
item.name: Work on Arduino projects and hardware hacking (small group)
